ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] (unknown)
ygData.msgSnippet: Oh come one, even EQLizer has had fake equipment on their site before.  Its bound to happen.  Nobody has time to verify all of the images that get sent in and
ygData.messageBody:
Oh come one, even EQLizer has had fake equipment on their site before. Its
bound to happen. Nobody has time to verify all of the images that get sent
in and some are bound to slip through. Don;t know how long that image was
there but when I went in this morning there was no link to it on the 'Chest'
page.

Kit

before crying wolf you might want to use a reputable equipment site like
eqlizer.
allakhazam will post whatever jpg anyone sends in without trying to verify
it.
